item.title: ComplexFuncBench: Exploring Multi-Step and Constrained Function Calling under Long-Context Scenario
item.description: ComplexFuncBench, a new benchmark, rigorously evaluates LLMs’ complex function-calling abilities across real-world scenarios involving multi-step processes, constraints, and long contexts.

item.title: Evolving Deeper LLM Thinking

item.title: GaussianAvatar-Editor: Photorealistic Animatable Gaussian Head Avatar Editor
item.description: GaussianAvatar-Editor enables photorealistic, text-driven editing of animatable 3D heads, solving motion occlusion and ensuring temporal consistency.

item.title: PaSa: An LLM Agent for Comprehensive Academic Paper Search

item.title: Textoon: Generating Vivid 2D Cartoon Characters from Text Descriptions
item.description: Textoon: Generating vivid 2D cartoon characters from text descriptions in under a minute, revolutionizing animation workflow.

item.title: Bridging Language Barriers in Healthcare: A Study on Arabic LLMs
item.description: Arabic LLMs struggle with medical tasks; this study reveals optimal language ratios in training data for improved performance, highlighting challenges in simply translating medical data for different …

item.title: Multiple Choice Questions: Reasoning Makes Large Language Models (LLMs) More Self-Confident Even When They Are Wrong
item.description: LLM reasoning boosts self-confidence, even when answers are wrong, highlighting limitations in current evaluation metrics.
